Package org.drip.measure.bridge

Class BrokenDateInterpolatorLinearT

java.lang.Object
org.drip.measure.bridge.BrokenDateInterpolatorLinearT
All Implemented Interfaces:
BrokenDateInterpolator
public class BrokenDateInterpolatorLinearT
extends java.lang.Object
implements BrokenDateInterpolator
BrokenDateInterpolatorLinearT Interpolates using Two Stochastic Value Nodes with Linear Scheme. The Scheme is Linear in Time.

  • Module = Computational Core Module
  • Library = Numerical Analysis Library
  • Project = Rd Continuous/Discrete Probability Measures
  • Package = Broken Date Brownian Bridge Interpolator
Author:
Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
